entities.name: boy
entities.description: The boy who lived is mentioned as the one Voldemort tried to kill, but couldn't. (Excerpt: 'They're saying he tried to kill the Potters' son, Harry.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's power broke when he couldn't kill the boy, and that's why he's gone. (Excerpt: 'when he couldn’t kill Harry Potter, Voldemort’s power somehow broke – and that’s why he’s gone.')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the son of the Potters who Voldemort tried to kill. (Excerpt: 'They're saying he tried to kill the Potters' son, Harry.')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character in the conversation, nodding glumly and giving a great sniff. (Excerpt: 'Dumbledore nodded glumly. ... Dumbledore gave a great sniff as he took a golden watch from his pocket...')

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a character in the conversation, with her voice trembling and dabbing at her eyes. (Excerpt: 'Professor McGonagall’s voice trembled as she went on... Professor McGonagall pulled out a lace handkerchief and dabbed at her eyes beneath her spectacles.')

relationships.description: Voldemort tried to kill the boy. (Excerpt: 'They're saying he tried to kill the Potters' son, Harry.')
Voldemort tried to kill Harry Potter. (Excerpt: 'They're saying he tried to kill the Potters' son, Harry.')
When Voldemort couldn't kill the boy, his power broke. (Excerpt: 'when he couldn’t kill Harry Potter, Voldemort’s power somehow broke – and that’s why he’s gone.')
